Miley Cyrus and her new boyfriend Cody Simpson have packed on the PDA in a spooky Instagram video of them in bed.

The couple are using terrifying Joker Instagram filters as they cuddle up together.

This gives them both clown masks which move with their faces and look eerily real.

Scantily-clad Miley, 26, leans in and starts to lick Cody, 22, who is shirtless in the video.

The couple then rub their tongues together as a soundtrack of the Joker's spooky laugh plays.

They then burst out laughing at the video ends.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Musician Cody recently revealed he has had a crush on Miley since he was just 12 years old.

The loved-up couple were just friends for a decade as she was in an on-off relationship with Australian actor Liam Hemsworth who later became her husband.

But following their divorce after just six-months of marriage, Miley and Cody finally got it together.

Miley had a brief fling with Kaitlyn Carter before hooking up with Cody.

(Image: Instagram)

Meanwhile Liam has now gone public with actress Madison Brown.

A newly resurfaced video from 2012 has proved that teen sensation Cody has always had feelings for the Hannah Montana star.

Cody was at a star-studded launch of Tiffany & Co. Mens line in Los Angeles on Friday, when he told People : "The reason why it hasn't been a really crazy sudden thing is just because we’ve been friends for so long."

(Image: Cody Simpson Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Cody is even is planning to release a song he penned for her while she was in hospitalised with tonsillitis.

He has already teased his fans by sharing an excerpt of the new track on Instagram .

"She’s pretty much forcing me to put it out," he said.

"She was like, ‘If you don’t put this s*** out, I’m putting it out on your behalf for you. I’m getting your Spotify login and doing this s*** myself.”
description: The couple cuddled up and touched tongues with a terrifying Instagram filter over their faces
